attributes.action: Stop Politicians form employing family members at the expense of the taxpayer.
attributes.additional_details: Ban all politicians from employing members of their own families at the cost of the taxpayer, this practice should be illegal, in some cases these jobs are not even advertised to the public, it is morally reprehensible for any politician to employ family members for doing little or no work, for an outrageous salary, that an ordinary British citizen could only ever dream of.
